LanguageData.Yokai_Install_LamiaSPT.label: install simple Lamia tail
LanguageData.Yokai_Install_LamiaSPT.description: Installs Lamia's Simple Prosthetic tail. Requires a min skill in medicine of 4.
LanguageData.Yokai_Install_LamiaBT.label: install bionic lamia tail
LanguageData.Yokai_Install_LamiaBT.description: Installs Lamia's bionic tail. Requires a min skill in medicine of 4.
LanguageData.Yokai_Install_JorouGumoSPL.label: install simple JorouGumo leg
LanguageData.Yokai_Install_JorouGumoSPL.description: Installs JorouGumo's Simple Prosthetic leg. Requires a min skill in medicine of 4.
LanguageData.Yokai_Install_JorouGumoBL.label: install bionic JorouGumo leg
LanguageData.Yokai_Install_JorouGumoBL.description: Installs JogouGumo's bionic leg. Requires a min skill in medicine of 4.
